description: Cathonic Charities/CYO’s mission is to house homeless people with disabling HIV and AIDS. At Leland House, which provides permanent housing, we respond to residents on a Harm Reduction basis working with behaviors as they become difficult for others and when they impede the safety of the resident themselves. www.cccyo.org
notes:
Referral required. Intake appointment needed – no drop-ins.

What to Bring: State-Issued ID, Social Security Card, Proof of SF Residency, TB Clearance; Medi-Cal card or other proof of insurance so that medications can be ordered.

keys: Assistance Getting Driver’s License or Other ID
Health & Wellness Education through in house dietician
Group Counseling/Therapy, HIV Support, Harm Reduction
Many additional supportive services available upon referral: behavioral health, employment, case management, and other specialists, as needed.
Medi-Cal card or other proof of insurance
All currently homeless individuals, 18 years or older, with disabling HIV or AIDS, psychiatric disorders or substance abuse issues.

usage_requirements_expression: has('state_id') and has('socail_scurity_card') and has('proof of residency') and has('tb Clearance') and should_have('proof of insurance') and ( fee('30% income','for rent') and $income < MAX ) and ( is_in_class('homeless') and $age >= 18Y and ( is_in_class('disabled') and ( has('hiv') or has('aids') or has('psychiatric disorders') or has ('subsitance abuse issues')) )
